item.description:
Fern Tausig will introduce us to a new perspective on loving yourself and becoming your own best friend. We all
know how to love, nurture and support our friends without judging them or criticizing them. How many times have you said, "I wish I had a friend like me!" See yourself the way your loved ones see you and focus on your strengths and those qualities that have made you the special, unique person you are.
You will learn how to become your own best friend. That person will attract business in a whole new way.

Fern Tausig is a Master Consulting Hypnotist, Certified Hypno Life Coach, Trainer and Motivational Speaker who is certified by the National Guild of Hypnotists and the International Association of Counselors and Therapists. With a 6th year level of education in secondary health education, and 35 years of teaching experience, she has a passion for both education and wellness. She helps clients achieve a healthier, happier, and more productive life through her private and group hypnosis sessions and corporate workshops. Fern has empowered women to feel their power and improve their self-esteem and relationships. She has helped clients lose weight, quit smoking, eliminate bad habits, as well as fears, phobias and anxiety. Fern combines her knowledge of nutrition, stress management, and holistic wellness in her work with her clients and regularly presents workshops and seminars for corporations, associations, and social clubs. She is available for inspiring talks on a variety of topics that are both empowering and educational. She may be reached at www.myHealingHypnosis.com, myHealingHypnosis@gmail.com 203-283-4567

Â
item.how_to_find_us: Comfort Keepers is in Village Walk on the second level.
item.name: Self love: A direct path to accomplishing your business goals.
